thesis.description: Insect control by means of chemicals has become a practical necessity nowadays in the protection of the world food supply against destruction by insects, and man against the transmission of infectious diseases carried by many of these pests. The insecticides, in suitable solvants or suspended in suitable 'vehicles', are usually applied to the plants in the form of sprays, or the poisons may be mixed with powdered materials and applied as a dust. [...]
thesis.creator: McArdle, A. Hope.
thesis.subject: Agriculture.
thesis.title: the Influence of Dieldrin on Enzyme Systems.
